name: Jumping Ball (Jasminezhang)
description:
Use the left button of the mouse to click and move around. Hit balls to decrease their HPs (different colors of balls have different HPs). The score is displayed below. 

Action Game Clone project for Intro to Games Development class at NYU Game Center. (The original game link: https://rowanqueue.itch.io/bug-jumper?secret=xR7oiC9JDTuh5V4pGK1OBA6GCdc)
